headline: Needham Lifts Axon Enterprise, Inc. (AXON)’s Price Target To $870, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: Axon Enterprise, Inc. (NASDAQ:AXON) is among the 11 Best Large Cap Defense Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On August 5, Needham analyst Joshua Reilly raised the stock’s price target to $870 from $820, while maintaining a Buy rating for its shares. The adjustment follows the company’s second-quarter earnings call on August 4, with reported […]
